subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Jazz has survived a late-season slump that cost it homecourt advantage in the first round, won Game 7 on the road in Houston to advance, then beat the Warriors despite averaging 23 turnovers.
snippet: The Jazz has survived a late-season slump that cost it homecourt advantage in the first round, won Game 7 on the road in Houston to advance, then beat the Warriors despite averaging 23 turnovers.
